features: Multi-Tasking Made Easy: Give your hair a fresh look while saving time and money by combining multiple benefits into one conditioner
5 Benefits, 1 Conidtioner: Put frizz at ease, strengthen your strands, improve flexibility, protect against humidity and add shine
Rich and Luscious Ingredients: Infuse your locks with keratin, argan oil and ceramides while avoiding that greasy, oily feel
Bask in the Scent: Fall in love with the breezy yet rich scent of tropical orange, island pineapple and golden amber with every squeeze of the bottle
Best for Last: Apply the conditioner generously to wet, shampooed hair. Let your hair absorb for 3–5 minutes and then rinse thoroughly
body.description: Make your showers count for more! OGX Frizz-Free + Keratin Smoothing Oil Conditioner is a true multitasker with the benefits of five products in one. It helps strengthen hair, improve flexibility, protect against humidity, keep hair frizz-free and reveal shiny hair—all in just one bottle. With hints of tropical orange, island pineapple and golden amber, it'll make your strands smell as good as they feel. Use with OGX Frizz-Free + Keratin Smoothing Oil Shampoo for maximum results.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We’re stylist-founded and on a mission to trailblaze originality. Hey beautiful! We’re inspired by originality, and it shows up in all we do, from how we make and package our products to the real, diverse and photoshop-free passion-fueled people who rep our brand. WHAT WE STAND FOR We ensure to find out what you love about you, so we can use our science to help you love it even more. We strive to curate experience using only high quality and effective ingredients. We ensure to champion inclusivity by celebrating, hiring and building products for all ethnicities, genders, ages and styles.

About Us We’re stylist-founded and on a mission to trailblaze originality. Hey beautiful! We’re inspired by originality, and it shows up in all we do, from how we make and package our products to the real, diverse and photoshop-free passion-fueled people who rep our brand. WHAT WE STAND FOR We ensure to find out what you love about you, so we can use our science to help you love it even more. We strive to curate experience using only high quality and effective ingredients. We ensure to champion inclusivity by celebrating, hiring and building products for all ethnicities, genders, ages and styles.

INSPIRED BY EXPERIENCE. BACKED BY SCIENCE. We want you to want to wash and style your hair, whether you’re watching your curls spring into place or the smell of coconut and vanilla are transporting you to the ocean-side. Our team of scientists constantly evolve our formulas to bring a spa-quality experience coupled with salon-quality safety and ingredient standards.

Our team of scientists constantly evolve our formulas to bring a spa-quality experience coupled with salon-quality safety and ingredient standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most wonderful scent as well as smoothing for hair
reviews.reviewText: Descent is somewhat reminiscent of a candle shop. It was delightful if you like that sort of thing. It works very well as far as conditioning, and makes him very smooth and tangle free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go-to shampoo product
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo and conditioner both in this brand/type works wonders on leaving my hair with no frizz. It’s not a product that sits heavy on your hair. My frizz is completely gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair is so soft!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner works great. My hair is super soft and manageable. Great price as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My hair is so soft and it smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: This smells AMAZING! I use the shampoo and then leave this on for five minutes and rinse out. My hair is so soft and smooth afterwards! My frizzy hair has been tamed somewhat (with the use of other products), but it shouldn't be used alone to get rid of frizz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I co-wash with this and it works. Price reasonable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This Conditioner is the best for tangled up damaged hair, leave in for 5mins & my hair is so soft & manageable & the smell is the best. My husband can't stop smelling it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor shipping, great product
reviews.reviewText: Shipped in a bag and the top came off. Half of the conditioner spilled out! Probably a good idea to ship in a box! Conditioner smells and feels great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this ! I could feel the softness difference within a week. My hair used to feel almost like straw and my skin would burn with a lot of conditioners. I am happy this one does not burn my head and it smells good too. It does add a shine to my hair as well. This is the first hair product in my life I have ever gotten excited about and to use. Will be sticking with this conditioner. Have used it since october 25th and still continue to do so and it is November 10th. I didn't want to write a review until I gave it a fair chance. I don't have issues getting it out of the bottle and it was packaged fine with no issues, thankfully since I did have other orders in the box it came with.

reviews.reviewTitle: No es lo que creía que iba a ser
reviews.reviewText: Me esperaba mejores cambios en el cuidado de mi cabello, tal vez sea que no tengo más de mes y medio usándolo o mi pelo se acostumbró porque las primeras veces que me lo eché me dejaba muy diferente el cabello a como me lo deja ahora
